website_summaries.verdict: For travelers who don't need extra bells and whistles and are watching their budgets, this 40-inch garment bag is a solid choice.
pros: A traditional, lightweight design with five colors to choose from
We love its exclusive WallyLock that keeps hangers in place
cons: The handles aren't very long, and there are no extra pockets for shoes or other items

customer_reviews.title: Lil Wally helps you look fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Wally! This lil Wally holds 2 suites with 2 shirts perfectly. It is an absolute must for domestic travel. I am writing this review after approximately 8 hard months of use and the zippers/clamps/exterior have held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: So I had a destination wedding, and I used this garment bag to pack my wedding gown. My wedding dress was a bit puffy but it fit right in it. It is very durable and very safe to transport gowns. I actually carried the dress/garment bag with me as a carry on during my flights and I had a 5 hour layover. It did not bother me at all and it kept my wedding dress safe. It was very easy to carry and eventually my dress didn't even need any ironing or steaming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solidly made, keeps garments in place, could use a shoulder strap and pockets
customer_reviews.text: My first test of this bag was on a trip that had me on 6 flights in 36 hours for a series of job interviews. The WallyBag locking system easily held two full suits and a few casual shirts in place for the whole trip, as well as holding my dirty clothes loose in the bottom on the way home. My only two complaints are that this bag doesn't have any pockets for smaller articles or items, and it would have been nice to have a shoulder strap on the bag for when you have to walk between terminals.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make a single trip
customer_reviews.text: The stitch between the material and the trim already has a 3” split in it. The bag was never mistreated and went in the overhead bin in carry on. By the time I had gotten to my destination the bag had a huge hole in the bottom of it. B cause of the nature of the material it can’t be repaired, the trim is intact but the bag cover itself has frayed. It gets two stars because I like the design of the bag. If it was constructed of better quality materials it would have gotten four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Devil's Advocate

customer_reviews.title: It is "okay"
customer_reviews.text: The garment bag as a whole looks durable. However, the video at the bottom of the product images is misleading. The video shows that the bag has pockets to add additional items. Even shows placing additional items in the pocket. This video needs to be taken down or they need to not sell the product without the pockets. I paid the extra money for the additional storage. Otherwise, I would have just purchased a less expensive item.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: not thrilled about it
customer_reviews.text: it's ok for a "cheap" bag. Handle should be located at middle of bag so when you carry the bag by the handle, your dresses stay in place. With the location of this handle, dresses and long items (bottom end that is not on the hanger) fall to the center of the bag - therefore they get wrinkled easily. I'm 5'8" and it was ALMOST long enough for my cocktail dress (the end bunched up a little). The latch to catch the hangers was great, but the handle location made it almost pointless to have a bag like this for long items.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Held our dress clothes easily and easy to hang and stow away in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for a weekend wedding away. Held our dress clothes easily and easy to hang and stow away in the overhead compartment. I had plenty of room for 3 full dress outfits including large men's suit. Well made and sturdy material, I look forward to having this a very long time. I didn't give 5 stars due to no separate compartment for shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rangermoed

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This item came in handy for packing up two suits and two gowns for my family heading via airplane to a wedding. The garment bag folded in half after it was full, and fit nicely in my hard-shell luggage for protection (along with the rest of our belongings). This was perfect, I couldn't have asked for something better for the price. And since it clamps your hangers, your clothing does not go swimming inside this garment bag.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: The Go-TO Carry-On bag for your Suits.
customer_reviews.text: Did plenty of research, and this carry-on for my suits has been a GEM. Easy zip-up design. The top clasp stays tight, keeping all of my hangers aligned the same way I set them when I packed. I can pack up to three suits and 5 shirts no problem. They fold over nicely, and the bag simply does what its supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Conscious Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great protective garmet bad. I used this for my wedding dress. We had a destiniton wedding and this bag helped my dress arrive and return safely. It is very thick and has a really nice clip at the top for the hangers. It was able to hold my large dress and my husbands tux. The reason I didn't give 5 stars is because i wish the bag had some sort of pocket for shoes. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Closure too hard to snap
customer_reviews.text: It’s durable, but would like this garment bag better If it didn’t have the snap closure at top to hold hangers in place. You cannot use just any kind of hanger and it’s too hard to snap, when you have more than two or three wire hangers. So... Not a winner for me. I do like the color though, it matches my luggage..Purple.
customer_reviews.author: clo

customer_reviews.title: Great garment bag !!
customer_reviews.text: This garment bag is great! We fit a Tux, 2 big men's suits and 2 gowns and still had some more room. Easy to carry and fits in the overhead bins on the plane. You will not be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim R. Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: these bags are pretty good. the quality and durability is excellent except ...
customer_reviews.text: these bags are pretty good. the quality and durability is excellent except i really wish that there was a zipper closure around the outside...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY DURABLE and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I wear suits for work almost every day and this bag is one of the very few that have held up. Most of the bags that are on Amazon are cheap pieces of garbage, but this one is extremely thick and durable and I like the latch at the top that holds the hangers in place. Yes it's expensive as all hell, and should probably cost closer to $25, but it is what it is and I'm satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: DaveP

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put dress clothes in when we had to fly for a wedding. It held all of our dress clothes for a weekend wedding event. I like that it folds up so that it doesn't take up much space and the clothes came out looking great even after all of our traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Czekalski

customer_reviews.title: NOT 60” LONG
customer_reviews.text: This arrived just in time for a trip as I realized our usual luggage was not long enough for the full length dresses we are taking with us. This appears durable & the mechanism for the hangers is sturdy but there is NO WAY this is 60”. My daughter is 5’6”, her dress doesn’t even hit the ground when she wears it & it’s totally scrunched in the bottom of this carrier. I would definitely be returning it if we didn’t need it immediately! Possibly after the trip I will update but right now I am super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My wife travels for work and loves that length so ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife travels for work and loves that length so that longer hanging clothes do not bet wrinkled. Obviously quality made be robust materials AND THE CLINCHER is the 'clincher' that will hold any type of hanger. That clamping device is what sold us on the garment bag after having many others over the years. We now own two these in different lengths.
customer_reviews.author: Just ME, Philip

customer_reviews.title: Just right for quick trips
customer_reviews.text: The bag was just the right length for me to pack a few hang-ables and carry on short trips. It holds the hangers in place and protects the clothes. For years I used disposable suit bags - I got tired of them ripping apart at just the wrong time! The Wally bag offers good protection in a light weight simple bag.
customer_reviews.author: M. Herriman

customer_reviews.title: STURDY & ROOMY GARMENT BAG
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so sturdy as well as pretty. For years I had a garment bag like it with the locking top and I hadn't been successful in finding another one like my old one. After much searching, I finally found this bag and ordered it, thinking I would be disappointed. Well, to my surprise, it not only has the locking top but it is so much more stury than my former bag, you could even "check" it at the airlines as it folds over the handle to half size. Used it on a recent trip and LOVED it. The delivery service was excellent, had it in plenty of time for my trip.
customer_reviews.author: LaceyLucy

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Did the job. Was able to carry 4 shirts, a suit, and 3 pairs of pants. More than I thought. Hangers locked in tight to prevent the clothes from falling into the bag. And the bag folds over nicely and can be carried like a small bag.
customer_reviews.author: Yoyoma99

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine as a carry on.  Not sure I'd let it through checked baggage.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Used as a carry on. Should hold a couple of suits. I packed a suit+dress shirt+wife's dress and jacket on non-curved hangers and probably could of packed another dress shirt and slacks. You don't want to pack too tightly to avoid wrinkles. Outside is a heavier thread nylon and inside is a thinner which make sense.
customer_reviews.author: redhed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Execution of a Bad Idea
customer_reviews.text: Seams are well done. Construction overall is good. But the design is terrible. I had no idea the bag would be so flimsy and difficult to use. The only option when you need to get anything in or out of the bag is to lay it on the floor. Should come with a hook to hang the bag up.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this for traveling with a wedding dress
customer_reviews.text: Used for my wedding dress to travel from Arizona to Florida for our Bahama wedding! It was durable and didn’t ruin the shape of the dress! My dress was also a ball gown with a lot of poof! We had to store it in the over head bins, but was able to make it fit; the planes didn’t have a coat closet that we were on to hang it up. Recommend this for traveling with a wedding dress! The picture shows how big the dress was.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting the most coveted garment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wedding dress, which I received in August, and my wedding isn't until May. I knew I would have to do some traveling (for the wedding itself and alterations appointments). The bag is perfect for what I want it for. I will say, it's likely that it will cause wrinkles, so if you're looking to avoid that you may want a different bag. However, as far as durability and protection from the elements, you can't beat this garment bag.
customer_reviews.author: septiembre928

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Garment Bag from WallyBags
customer_reviews.text: Love the purple color. I travel by car and being able to put my suits and dresses in a bag and hang them up in the back seat. The locking system for hangers makes it all so easy to just fold it up and put the carry handles over my extended suitcase handle. So easy...and I have a free hand!
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good. Wally worked.
customer_reviews.text: After one trip, it kept my two suits in great shape. Delta airlines messed up and didn't give me the closet space I paid for, so the suit had to be folded. (Very important appointment.) No worries... Wallybag did just fine. I love the locking mechanism for the hangers. Worked very well, and the natural fold to the bag helps.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieGo

customer_reviews.title: Best garment bag! No frills necessary.
customer_reviews.text: As a consultant, I travel with this often. It holds up against my constant tossing. The hanger attachment at the top is a secure metal with a good lock - I can fit two or three hangers in it. The canvas is very decent and the zipper is not the highest quality, but works just fine. This is a good mid-size for men's clothing when you fold it in half. The bigger may work better for some, but it's a bit bulky at that size.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Roomy Garment Bag
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a cruise and found it easy to hang my clothes in and the clasp to hold the hangers worked great. The only complaint I have is that it was a little clumsy to handle. I didn't mark anything regarding the durability since I only used it one time.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: The bag itself is nice. It has one major problem
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is nice. It has one major problem. There are no straps to hold your dress in place. Your clothes will pool at the bottom. If you look at the picture, the garment bag is held upside down. Most garment bags have straps that hold you dress and then after you fold it you hold it from the center. The design of the WallyBag defeats the purpose of using a garment bag.
customer_reviews.author: Specialk

customer_reviews.title: wally bag
customer_reviews.text: it a good bag to put a suit in if eney one was going to buy this .this is the bag to put your suit it is strong fabric
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for WEDDING dresses :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this garment bag in order to travel with my wedding dress. I love how you can fold the bag in half and the very secure holder for the top of the hangers so there is no sliding. I'm so glad I bought this garment bag and will be storing my wedding dress in this bag now after the wedding is over. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Anne

customer_reviews.title: My first garment bag
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight material. I really like the clasp/lock that fastens together at the top, and keeps my hangers in place when I travel. Looks like the wally bag will allow for 4-5 wooden hangers at a time (maybe a 6th?). I tend to double/triple up garments per hanger (i.e. hang pants, blouse, and cardigan on 1 hanger) when I can. I also like that it folds in half and the handles can be velcroed closed (nice touch). Makes trips to/from gym in the morning (when I actually go) hassle free. Thank you Wally Bags I've always wanted a garment bag and I'm glad this was my first :)
customer_reviews.author: Katherina

customer_reviews.title: The clamp to hold the hangers if very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the feature that allowed the hangers to be be clamped in place but suggest you use thin wire hangers to get more clothes on hangers into the bag. It turned out that I didn't really need a bag this long, but it works well to fold in half. I'm also thinking that I can use this bag inside of my suitcase to store clothes neatly as well. I did buy an additional luggage strap to keep this bag more compact as well. It seems to be well made and I'm planning to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Durable and held so much!
customer_reviews.text: Did the job well. We easily stuffed a mens suit, full length bridesmaids dress, cocktail dress, toddler suit, flower girl dress, and three pairs of shoes in this thing! It folded in half just fine and we didn't have a problem with the hangers staying put. We also checked it as baggage both ways and it held up great. Would definitely recommend. It was nice knowing that it was waterproof as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea214

customer_reviews.title: Scheduled for Return
customer_reviews.text: Garment bag is completely different than is depicted in the photos and description. The fabric is very thin and you can practically see straight through it. Additionally, the bag arrived with a tear in the bottom of the bag. The product resembles the photo posted in another review, where it's small, sheer and cheap. Instead, the bag that arrived is linked here:
customer_reviews.author: Chris Llaca

customer_reviews.title: NOT long enough for gowns!
customer_reviews.text: This is Not a gown length bag. I had hoped to use it to take on a cruise, but when I placed my long dresses in the bag, the hems of the dresses were bunched up in the bottom of the bag. These dresses did not have trains, nor were they exceptionally long, as I am 5'6" and the dresses are just off the floor when worn without my shoes. That being said, the bag was well made and would work well for regular dresses or suits. But if you want a bag for evening gowns, you will need to go with the 66-inch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia reese

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for my wedding dress!
customer_reviews.text: Like other brides, I was able to fit my poofy wedding dress (ballgown with a train) and my husband's suit in this bag for our destination wedding. It's definitely bigger than a typical travel bag, but I was able to take it on each plane I went on (standard planes, no puddle jumpers).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: The price was good, but the height was not
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to hold academic regalia (U.S.) for an average height male at a university. The price was good, but the height was not. It is just slightly too short to hold the robes--they bunch up a bit (a couple inches) at the bottom. It is not a deal-breaker (hence 4 stars), but it is worth mentioning. The robe has not, as of yet, suffered any ill-effects or wrinkles. The bag is nice and thin, and the thick fabric helps it stay that way (bags with thinner fabric tend to billow out and become unwieldy).
customer_reviews.author: College of Business

customer_reviews.title: and it was great! It is well made and fit my long ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take formal clothes on a cruise, and it was great! It is well made and fit my long formal dress and my husband's suit perfectly. I even folded up a good sized blanket and put it in there. It fit everything without issue. I highly recommend getting one of these for cruising or any kind of travel.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriel Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great for my wedding dress
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my wedding dress. The dress has somewhat of a long train and it still worked fine, but had to be bunched a the end. I was not worried about this, as it is just going to sit in storage for years now...
customer_reviews.author: Jami ValkosTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size for traveling and fits a bunch of garments
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to transport my wedding dress for my destination wedding and it worked out perfectly! I also fit my husband's suit and 3 other dresses in it. It's the perfect size for traveling and fits a bunch of garments. I was very nervous to transport my wedding dress on an airplane because I didn't want it to get ruined or be told it was too big and needed to be checked with my other luggage. I went through security with no issues and the dress made it to our wedding destination in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Loubs

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, and too expensive for the quality.  Video shows a different bag and is misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Not the same bag as in the video. This unit does not have bags for shoes or extras, only the main compartment. It appears to be made ok, but for the price, I expect much more. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: No extra pocket for shoes, but a great, simple bag nonetheless.
customer_reviews.text: Be advised: the video included on the 40 inch Garment Bag shows an extra zippered compartment for shoes / accessories, and this particular bag DOES NOT include this extra section. You'll want this bag instead:; I quickly purchased this bag the week before my wedding without looking at the other WallyBags available on Amazon and was admittedly a bit disappointed having seen the video and making a rushed purchase on this bag. My bad. This being said, I kept, used, and really like this bag, particularly the durable construction and hanger clip. Totally satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I'VE HAD THIS SINCE 2016 AND MAYBE USED IT 10-15 TIMES AND THE METAL STRAP THAT HOLDS THE HANGERS HAS BROKEN OFF MORE THEN 5 TIMES ! NOT WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: ANTONIO FERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Well-built and well-designed
customer_reviews.text: This would just be an unremarkable, though good-quality nylon garment bag if not for the clamp at the top. It holds wire hangars in place even when carrying the bag by the handles. This thing is simple, well-constructed, and well-designed. I am probably going to buy a couple more in different colors to organize and protect my suits.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lan

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot longer than I imagined it would be when opened up. Too long to hang in a car. Although that allows you to put junk in the bottom (assuming you're not folding it) and have it not touch the clothes. We put underthings, belts, and slippers in it and it transported well but it was a car trip and did not have to be folded. I wouldn't use this for a checked bag, it's not that heavy. Probably ok for carry on though. We also found we had to hold it by the hangers or they would slip down. But I think for the price it's a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: C. Curtiss

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great garment bag. My daughter is in FFA and has to wear official dress and carry her clothes with her for competition, convention, etc. This bag holds 2 ironed shirts, skirts, and her jacket easily. Very nice material and zipper. The clothes stay neat and clean.
customer_reviews.author: lsal mom

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for Cruise formal night outfits
customer_reviews.text: For a recent cruise vacation, we decided to bring clothes to dress up for formal night, which made it necessary to get a garment bag for the suits and dresses. This bag provided a cost effective way to get them from our home, on flights, and onto the boat. It's a no frills unit that doesn't have any extra pockets for shoes and things, but that was fine with me. I concur with the other recommendations to get some simple wire hangers to maximize the carrying capacity.
customer_reviews.author: A Texan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I had a cross country flight for my wedding, and used this to transport my ballgown dress. I was nervous that my dress wouldn't fit with all of its poof, but it fit perfectly, and worked really well for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: The Blonde Likes Books

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Husband for a recent trip. Good quality material, zipper and handles. I bought the Royal Blue for easy identification at the Airport. The only negatives are there's no Window to put an identification card and it doesn't have it's own hook to hang it. However, I'm Very pleased with this purchase for his Suit, Shirts, Tie, Shoes & Socks all in one bag staying neat and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & design
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality especially when compared to the others that I tried and had to return. Will be using this for my wedding dress!
customer_reviews.author: Yarisbel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product as advertised. I would recommend. It's very long for my suits. The material is thick enough and the hanger clip holds everything in place.
customer_reviews.author: felipe

customer_reviews.title: It is better than others I have seen and the material is ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okayyyyy. It is better than others I have seen and the material is very durable. But it isn't whoa must buy because I think it's still pretty pricey. It's also kinda hefty and feels like you're carrying a larger bag or luggage. I can tell my clothes will be safe inside the bag but wish there was a shoe compartment or shoe bag included. If it was $20 it would instantly be 5 stars in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Alexandro Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Nice carry-on for suits.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for us. No matter what you will receive wrinkles in your shirts when packing/folding them, however, it causes less wrinkling then just putting them in a normal suitcase with all your other stuff. Great way to travel with suits and you can bring as carry on. which is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, light enough to carry easily and heavy duty enough to protect what is inside. I really like the hanger grabbing device at the top - it allows the bag to be fully unzipped and removed without having to take the hanger off of the hook or closet rod. The device also keeps the hangers from falling into the garment bag and keeps everything inside spaced to help keep clothes wrinkle free. I would not advise checking this in as airline luggage - it is light enough to carry on and fold neatly in the overhead.
customer_reviews.author: jedi008

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I needed to transport a suit for a wedding in a way that would be extremely convenient and keep the suit in nice condition. This bag was really helpful for doing that! I think some folks complain about the hanger locking mechanism at the top, although I had no issues with it whatsoever. I locked the hangers in place after slipping everything into the bag and then zipped up the bag. I was easily able to fit a two-piece suit and two shirts in there with space to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H.

customer_reviews.title: Good travel bag, not too bulky
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag, but like all hanging garment bags, there is an automatic flaw due to how they hang. On the side that does not have the hanger, where the bottoms of your clothing fall, gravity will make them crumple at the middle section while you have it in the storage mode. Just be sure to hang it up when you get on the plane or lay it out when traveling. I made the mistake of not doing this and the bag became worthless, everything was crumpled when I arrived.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perovich

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money! You pay $20 more for the stupid clasping mechanism on the top??? The back is nice material but the front is the same thin cheap garment bag material. Get the one with pockets for shoes, this one has no pockets..... Somehow I thought I had bought that one but got lost in the endless linking journey trying to find the best price. Somehow you just pay $20 extra for the stupid clasp at the top. It is as advertised though so 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: drewbsn

customer_reviews.title: Well made garment bag at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Garment Bag is well made and fairly durable. It folds in half and has two handles for easy carry. The only thing I don't like is that the padded closing mechanism doesn't fit hangars with large necks that well. Looks like it was made more for the skinny metal Dry Cleaner hangars.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: love it. we are going to my sons wedding ...
customer_reviews.text: love it. we are going to my sons wedding out of town,flying and this is great. The lenght is what caught my eye. My husbands tux and my formal dress will both fit nicley in there and and to be able to fold it and carry it on ,i will be so much happier. Dont need to show up for the wedding with no attire for fear of the airport losing our luggage!
customer_reviews.author: Melody sweet

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great quality....maybe a little larger than needed, but the previous "narrower" one was cheeply made and split out. This one is a woven fabric and seems to be reinforced t stress points.
customer_reviews.author: skeet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag, being close in quality to the other one we own, except that one full side of it is not made of thicker material like our other bag, but, still, it's built well enough, and folds up nicely. The clamp at the top easily holds all of your hangers so nothing falls inside. Sturdy enough to handle normal travel situations, but you still have to be reasonable in how you take care of this item, just like anything else. I am happy to have ordered this bag, and can recommend it to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: coasteray

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this garment bag to transport my Mother of the Groom dress by air. Worked like a charm. Dress arrived just fine and bag was sturdy. Flight attendants even had me put the garment bag dress over carry ons and still was not crushed. Great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Missing Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Destination Wedding
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my wedding dress (we had a destination wedding)- the garment bag protected it perfectly and my dress didn't even get wrinkled! This product seems very durable. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Not the deluxe luggage quality bag we thought
customer_reviews.text: Really expected this bag to be more sturdy than the lightweight thin canvas fabric it is. We wanted something that could be checked at airport on occasion, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: SJS Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great garment bag for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a carry-on bag for formal outfits. We fit a suit and 2 dresses and had room to spare. The latch at the top was very helpful to keep the hangers in place and secure. The bright color made me feel safe traveling with it as most other travelers have black baggage. The size was perfect. We debated between the 40" and the next two sizes up. Glad we purchased this size as anything larger would have been too long and cumbersome to travel with. Construction is sturdy- haven't had any issues with breaking or falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: jMickD

customer_reviews.title: Such a steal!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for taking my wedding dress to Mexico! The lock that goes around the hangers worked so well and this can fit my dress and husbands outfit. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I ended up just folding cloths in the bag, then folding wally bag to carry with the handles. I now use compression cube zip bags. So much easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Regular hangers don't work well with the closure
customer_reviews.text: The product is a nice fabric however the clamp that closes over the hangers doesn't work well and makes the bag heavy. We returned it for something lighter by WallyBags
customer_reviews.author: laurals

customer_reviews.title: Halppy with my WallyBags Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The material of the garment bag is very sturdy and durable. When I retrieved the bag after checking it at the airport, it still looked brand new( and you know how that baggage gets thrown around). The length was perfect for the long dresses that I packed in it. Overall, it was an excellent purchase and I would recommend it for anyone looking for an affordable, sturdy, durable, and extra-length garment bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Vida

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag easy and light to use. Used bag while traveling to Jamaica with my wedding dress and grooms tux. Had very few winkles on bottom of dress and no wrinkles on tux. Wire hangers stayed in place through 3 flights. Would give it a 5 star if the bag had a shoulder strap which would make it much easier for travel with it and the price. would recommend for wedding travel
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, very strong bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag worked really well!! I put my wedding dress and my maid of honor's dress in it. My wedding dress was a ball gown style with a court train. I decided to take a chance and have the bag checked at the airport. No damage whatsoever! It is a very nice and strong bag!
customer_reviews.author: JennB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty basic garment bag
customer_reviews.text: Pretty basic garment bag. It has a nice closure that the top. I bought it for my wedding dress and it was too short and my dress did not have a train. We still used it due to no time to get another one just shoves it all in there. The dress was basically fibe after the flight so it did it's job.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Garment bag worked great to transport two suits during airline travel. Held a total of four hangers no problem. Of note, this item does not have any exterior pockets, so you will need to pack your shoes separately.
customer_reviews.author: Pearce

customer_reviews.title: The only garment bag I’ll ever buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the extra cost when compared to cheaper options. Everything about this product is better than competitors. Lasts longer, stores clothes better, space for shoes & essentials at the bottom, durable zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A really good garnet bag
customer_reviews.text: Finally a sturdy useful garnet bag that won't tear with the first use. So many garnet bags are nothing more than glorified plastic bags like the kind the cleaners put over your clothes. This one is for real - I didn't like the clamp at the top grabbing the hangar necks at first, but now I see the wisdom - shirts and slacks no longer fall down inside the bag during transport. Not the cheapest, but in the long run it should outlast 10 of the flimsy ones.
customer_reviews.author: Connecticut Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Sturdy Garment Bag
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time and am happy to say it is a great product. Just remember you have to use flat hangers with it so you can get as much as possible in it and still have it close properly. I got 8 hangers in there so I was happy. My clothes were perfect when I opened it up however they were in the car not on a plane. FYI they sell the 42 inch at Steinmart and charge more than what Amazon charges for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chatty Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Planes, trains, and abuse
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I used this to take our wedding clothes to Italy for our wedding. We carried my husbands full suit (pants, shirt, tie, belt) and my dress, plus our shoes in the bag. It was heavy but the bag withheld! It ended up being so expensive to ship back home, we just carried it with us as we backpacked Europe for the next month. It is still in great condition! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good for daily use / commuting
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day to carry dress clothes to the gym, when I walk or bike to work, etc. it is very well made, big enough to hold a 38 inch sleeve shirt, and I like the hanger gripping device at the top. I actually bought three different garment bags and this is the one I use. However, it does not have any features that would make it useful for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bag long enough for my wife's gown as we were flying to Florida for a wedding. Seemed to do the job even adding my suit to the bag. Room for maybe 4 items. Won't probably use it again in a hurry, but it's good to have in case.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Rozzi

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, even after 1 year!
customer_reviews.text: Initial quality is very good. Very sturdy material. Will update after a few months of use Update: After more than a year of steady use, this bag is holding up well. Good investment!
customer_reviews.author: A.P.C.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for a better protecter of my clergy robes - length is great
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for a better protecter of my clergy robes - length is great! I am tall! I will get the next one with the outside zipper to carry accesories (like heals) as I wear flats while traveling)
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Holds quite a few hangers
customer_reviews.text: We used for formal dresses and suit for a cruise. It was fine but, the long dresses got wrinkled on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Justjamm

customer_reviews.title: For Pros who run around alot and need to dress well.
customer_reviews.text: had one of the cheapo bags that the mens chain stors give you when you buy a new suit. It died fast. This bag can handle 4 suits and few shirts. High quality and nice construction.
customer_reviews.author: Moose MaGee

customer_reviews.title: Simple in design without compromising quality
customer_reviews.text: We have all had to take a short trip or drive to an overnight meeting. Walking into a hotel with your hang-up clothes flopping all over the place looks bad. Not only does this bag look nice, it is also durable and simple. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: MiamiBeachDrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I received this bag right before a trip we were taking. It was just the right size for 2 dresses, 2 suit coats with shirts and pants. Also the clasp that holds the hangers is very well made, non slip. We were able to carry it without any problems of slipping, or hangers sliding all over. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: k.m. querio

customer_reviews.title: This is sturdy and long enough to properly store the ro and ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag to store my graduation robe between commencement ceremonies. This is sturdy and long enough to properly store the ro and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice garment bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice garment bag. The fabric is a substantial weight, not flimsy. The width is a good size so jacket shoulders aren't wrinkled from being crushed at the sides.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieZ

customer_reviews.title: get the job done
customer_reviews.text: This was the right product for the right price point. I can fit a suit and several shirts in comfortably, and the locking mechanism is very convenient. My main quibble is that the velcro strap to fit around your suitcase handle is a little on the short side. Maybe my suitcase's handle is just bulkier than usual, but it took a couple tries before I could wrap this around, and still does even after it's stretched out a little.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat tis deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he seems to like it especially how it locks the hangers in and that it is waterproof. I thought I had ordered the one with the zippers for shoes and stuff but didn't. Oh well, next time. It is made very well and the quality is good as well as the price. I also like that it folds and has handles. It is really nice and I would order it again. Great price by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy bag & qualifies as carry-on luggage!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed to bring a man's suit, shirt, and 2 formal dresses to a wedding we were attending in FL. There was plenty of room in the bag and the bag can be used as carry-on luggage. This was especially important since I didn't want to be left without a dress should my luggage go missing. Great purchase--would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gruz

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag. The hangers peek through just enough and it does not have that Hugh big hook on a chain like some do. It is light weight, easy to store, and it kept my clothes clean and dry. It was even long enough to accommodate my dress. It is easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Sturdy Bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a little longer than I expected, but I suppose it is good for long gowns too if you ever need to put anything like that in there. I used mine for 3 suit jackets and a pair of slacks. Also, had dress shoes in a plastic bag and put it inside the wallybag in the middle. Took it on the plane and was very nice and sturdy, might just get the shorter one next time just for my own convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: perfect size and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We needed to carry a dress and suit on the airplane, as we never check bags anymore. This held two suit jackets, suit pants, and a dressy top and skirt, all in their hangers from our closet. It is very lightweight, and when folded in half, it's easy to carry and to fit in the overhead compartments on the airplane. It is just the right size. It has the "wally" clamp that clamps down the hangers so they don't slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Never Too Old To LearnTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for a long stage outfit.
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for a stage outfit that's quite long and doesn't wrinkle so being able to fold the whole bag in half easily is a nice feature. Hold the hanger in place too so I'm not fooling around with that trying to get the outfit in and out of the bag which I'm always doing in a hurry. Pretty durable and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wiford

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It was too flimsy to check at the airport. It didn't have a "hanger" part where I could hang the clothes so they didn't slip down in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have had several soft, thin plastic garment bags the fall apart in no time. This bag is very substantial and is what I've been looking for. It's easy to carry with the double handles and for short runs from the house to car or car to hotel, my clothes didn't wrinkle when folded for carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G.

customer_reviews.title: WALLY BAG 52 INCH
customer_reviews.text: THIS BAG HAS A GOOD LENGTH TO COVER PANTS HUNG BY THE CUFF,SHIRTS AND JACKETS. THE HANGER HOOKS STAY FIXED AND WON'T FALL INTO THE BAG. NICE COLOR OF BLUE AND BEING MADE OF HIGH QUALITY NYLON, IT CLEANS UP WELL.. I'VE USED THIS BAG TWICE NOW AND IT IS PERFORMING WELL
customer_reviews.author: E-Z BREATHER

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag: Sturdy, but not Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bag. It's sturdy and well-made without being as bulky as some of the more expensive garment bags I've come across. The material is heavy nylon and the clasp for holding onto the hangars is well-made. I would definitely recommend to anyone who wants a slim, but solid garment bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: This is a great garment bag
customer_reviews.text: At first I was sceptical. The bag seemed small and cheap quality. I swore it would not survive one plane trip and the clothes would come out wrinkled at the destination. I could not have been more wrong. I travelled internationally and I squeezed in three suits and two tops in the bag. When I arrived at the hotel I was getting ready to iron the items, and to my surprise, I did not have to do anything, but hung the garments in the closet. This is a great garment bag!
customer_reviews.author: Anna H.

product_meta.title: Wally Bags 40" Garment Bag, Black, 40 inch
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:40 inchGet there in one piece and be ready for any special occasion. Clothes stay neat and wrinkle-free in this lightweight and easy to carry-on garment bag with WallyLock hanger clamp. The Wally clamp holds up to six garments and accepts any type of hanger so clothes won't fall to the bottom of the bag. No folding, rolling, or special packing skills required. Just grab from your closet and place right into your garment bag – ready for travel. Durable, polyester fabric is water repellent, providing all weather protection. Superior construction guarantees long-lasting performance. This suit length garment bag folds in half and handles fasten together for easy carrying. Handles wrap around the trolley system of luggage for effortless travel. Conveniently fits in the airplane’s overhead bin and can be used as a carry-on item for most airlines. Alternatively, material is flexible enough to be folded to fit inside a suitcase as a garment packer. Hanger clamping system design mark is registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office. Three year limited manufacturer’s warranty. Dimensions: 40L x 22W x 3D (inches) Folded Dimensions: 20L x x22W x 6D (inches)*Length and Depth is approx and dependant on the amount of clothing packed.
feature_bullets: USE YOUR OWN HANGERS FOR QUICK AND EASY PACKING: WallyLock hanger clamp holds up to 6 garments and secures any hanger at the top of the bag to keep clothes neat and wrinkle-free. The perfect solution for traveling with suits and dress shirts whether by car, plane, train, or boat. Just grab from your closet and place right into your garment bag – ready for travel.

TAKE IT AS A CARRY ON OR FOR A LONG WEEKEND: Conveniently fits in the airplane’s overhead bin and can be used as a carry-on item for most airlines. Alternatively, material is flexible enough to be folded to fit inside a suitcase as a garment packer.

HIGH QUALITY FABRIC AND SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION: Durable, polyester fabric is water repellent, providing all weather protection. Superior construction guarantees long-lasting performance. A full length center zipper allows for easy access.
TRAVEL WITH EASE: This suit length garment bag folds in half and handles fasten together for easy carrying. Handles wrap around the trolley system of luggage for effortless travel.
3 YEAR MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY: Contact us directly for warranty service and repairs.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
